pullrequest.title: fix material reference problem, issue #294 (same as 79afc48)

content.raw:
Looks like we have other differences between stumps and standard VRC world. We probably should merge them just to be sure that people is using same physics conditions on both.

```diff -u vrc_task_2_stumps.world vrc_task_2.world```
